about.title: About La Cueva
about.heroParagraph: In the heart of the Dead Sea—one of the world’s most distinctive destinations—La Cueva Aqua Park was born as an idea that goes beyond traditional entertainment. It was not created to be just a water park, but a complete experience lived in every detail, where fun, safety, and organization meet in one destination.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: La Cueva is a fully integrated water park located in South Shouna – Dead Sea. It spans approximately 30 dunums and includes a variety of water attractions, pools, and kids’ areas.

story.title: La Cueva Story
story.content:
La Cueva Aqua Park is a leading water entertainment destination in Jordan, developed with a modern vision focused on experience quality, operational efficiency, and diverse target segments.
La Cueva is part of the investments of Al Nabali & Al Fares Holding Group, which has long experience in developing unique projects and promoting sustainable leisure tourism.

concept.title: The Concept
concept.content:
La Cueva is not just a place to visit...
It’s a space to escape routine.
Every detail was designed to speak to the visitor’s feeling:
Smooth movement, diverse experiences, and a constant sense of safety.

locationStrategy.title: Strategic Location
locationStrategy.content:
Choosing the Dead Sea was not only a geographical decision—it was a strategic one.
The location places La Cueva on an active tourism route close to Amman, hotels, and resorts.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be the #1 water destination for families in Jordan.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Deliver a safe, enjoyable, and high-quality entertainment experience.

safety.title: Technology & Safety
safety.intro: Because real fun is never complete without safety:

awards.title: Awards & Certifications
items: Awarded "Top Tourist Destination 2019" by the Jordanian Ministry of Tourism

brandPromise.title: La Cueva Promise
brandPromise.content:
La Cueva is not just a point on the map...
It’s a world tied to summer, laughter, and memories.
In every season and every visit, La Cueva promises an integrated experience unlike any other.

attractions.title: Water Attractions
attractions.intro: La Cueva offers a variety of attractions categorized by excitement level to suit all visitors.
bullets: Water slides with different thrill levels

waterSlides.title: Water Slides
waterSlides.desc: Slides with varying thrill levels—from gentle family rides to high slides for adventure seekers.

wavePool.title: Wave Pool
wavePool.desc: A pool that recreates a sea-like experience with waves of different intensities, suitable for all ages.

lazyRiver.title: Lazy River
lazyRiver.desc: A calm river ride to relax and enjoy the surrounding natural scenery.

adrenalineTower.title: Adrenaline Tower
adrenalineTower.desc: The highest point in the park, offering an exciting experience for thrill seekers and challengers.

familyPools.title: Family Pools
familyPools.desc: Pools with different depths suitable for all family members, with comfortable seating areas.

kidsAreaAttraction.title: Kids Area
kidsAreaAttraction.desc: A dedicated area with safe, colorful attractions for young children.

kidsArea.title: Kids Area
kidsArea.intro: A safe area designed especially for children, featuring colorful water games and shallow pools, with continuous supervision by lifeguards.

slides.title: Kids Slides
slides.desc: Slides designed specifically for children with bright colors and safe heights.

safety.title: Safety Information
safety.desc:
Safety is our first priority.
La Cueva is committed to applying the highest safety standards across all facilities, with a trained and qualified lifeguard team continuously supervising pools and water attractions.
We kindly ask all visitors to follow the posted instructions on-site and comply with the guidance of the safety team to ensure a fun and safe experience for everyone.

ageGuide.title: Age Guide
ageGuide.desc: Attractions suitable for every age group with clear guidelines to ensure children’s safety.

food.title: Food & Beverage
food.intro: La Cueva restaurants offer a variety of options to suit all tastes—from fast meals to family-style dishes—within an organized environment that ensures quality preparation and fast service to complete your day with comfort and fun.

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.desc: Restaurants serving a variety of fast meals such as pizza and burgers.

cafes.title: Cafes
cafes.desc: Enjoy a relaxing break at La Cueva cafes, offering a selection of hot and cold drinks in a comfortable setting—perfect between activities.

snacks.title: Snacks & Drinks
snacks.desc: We offer a range of snacks and refreshing drinks that add energy and coolness to an active day, with options for both adults and kids.

events.title: Events & Offers
events.intro: Includes seasonal offers, summer events, and birthday celebrations.

seasonal.title: Seasonal Offers
seasonal.desc: Follow our special seasonal offers that give you extra value and unique experiences during selected times of the year. Our offers are designed to make your visit more fun and more affordable.

birthday.title: Birthday Parties
birthday.desc:
Celebrate birthdays in an exceptional way in an atmosphere full of fun and organization.
We offer various packages that include entry, dedicated celebration spaces, and additional services to ensure an unforgettable day for you and your children.

private.title: Private Events
private.desc: We host private events, family occasions, and corporate gatherings in a fully equipped environment, with flexible organization options that fit each group’s needs.

schools.title: Schools & Groups
schools.intro: La Cueva welcomes school trips and groups with special programs and tailored pricing.

trips.title: School Trips
trips.desc:
La Cueva provides a safe and well-organized environment for school trips, combining fun with a unique group experience.
We ensure proper supervision, precise organization, and dedicated spaces for schools to guarantee an enjoyable and safe experience for students and teachers.

packages.title: Group Packages
packages.desc: Group packages are designed for family gatherings, companies, and schools, with special rates and flexible options based on group size and requirements.

tickets.title: Tickets & Pricing
tickets.intro: Full-day entry tickets include all attractions and facilities, with prices varying by season.

adults.title: Adults
adults.desc: Ages 12 and above 25 JOD depending on the season, and include access to all attractions and facilities inside the water park.

kids.title: Children
kids.desc: Children under 2 years enter for free.

seniors.title: Seniors
seniors.desc: Seniors aged 65 and above enter for free.

included.title: What's Included
included.text: The ticket includes entry to all available water attractions during official operating hours and use of the public facilities inside the water park. It does not include lunch meals or any paid services inside the water park.

notes.title: Important Notes
items: Available payment methods: cash, bank cards, and electronic payment options available on-site.
Life jackets and water floats are available free of charge when needed.
Please follow the posted instructions on-site to ensure everyone’s safety.
Outside food and drinks are not allowed inside the water park.
The water park is closed during winter.
The aquarium operates from 11:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
